plot outline: Watch the full movie, Pranayatheeram online, only on Eros Now. Pranayatheeram is a 2000 Indian Malayalam film, directed by K. Balachander and produced by Sreelal Devaraj. The film stars Mukesh & Kushboo in lead roles. The film had musical score by Marathakamani.
